name: happy feet booties
notes:
materials 

to make a set of 4 pairs of booties…

- 1 of purl soho’s [cotton chirp dk mini bundles][1], 100% peruvian pima cotton. each bundle includes four 58-yard, 25-gram balls; approximately 50 (55) total yards required per pair of booties.
- us 5 (3.75 mm), 16-inch [circular needles][2], or a set of [double pointed needles][3]
- if using 16-inch circulars: a spare us 5 straight, circular, or double pointed needle for binding off
- a [stitch marker][4] or scrap yarn

gauge
20 stitches and 40 rows = 4 inches in garter stitch

sizes
0–3 months (3–6 months)

finished foot circumference: 4¼ inches
finished foot length: 3¾ (4¼) inches
finished height from heel to top cuff: 2½ inches
samples: we knit all of our booties in the 0–3 months size.

designed by purl soho designer, [hiromi glover][5]. click [here][6] to see even more of hiromi’s work!


  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/cotton-chirp-dk-minis.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet.html?collection_filter=23796
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet.html?collection_filter=23796
  [4]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet.html?collection_filter=964
  [5]: https://www.purlsoho.com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/
  [6]: https://www.instagram.com/mignonnegrise/
